/usr/local/cuda-11.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_70,code=[compute_70,sm_70] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/src/references/referenceCPU.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/src/references/referenceGPU.cu.o CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/src/utils/chronoCPU.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/src/utils/chronoGPU.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/Histogram.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
